alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:04PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Bladen, central Columbus and central Horry Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 502 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a few strong thunderstorms between Allsbrook and Sydney, moving east-northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conway, Whiteville, Tabor City, Loris, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Homewood, Hallsboro, Adrian, Nakina, Redbug, Bughill, Williams, Goretown, Old Dock, Mollie, Sidney, Clarendon, Dulah and Bayboro. This includes SC Highway 22 between mile markers 6 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
